On Jan 26, 2011, at 8:30 AM, Nathan wrote:

> In that case, sorry, but I h=
ave to disagree.

Fair enough :)

When considering operability and scalabil=
ity, or when the client is running on a web server (like a front-end talkin=
g to some other service) I would not opt for client side (in particular in =
process) caching.
